Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8927 affecting package brotli for versions less than 1.0.7-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-8927 affecting package brotli for versions less than 1.0.7-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package brotli is earlier than 1.0.7-10, affected by CVE-2020-8927
